title: Rust-Oleum Oil 279847 EPOXYShield Anti Skid 3.4-Ounce
description: Rust-Oleum Concrete Preparation Anti-Skid Additive is the easy way to and a slip-resistant grip to floor coatings during application. Simply mix into coating to be used and then apply as per directions. Additive is appropriate for use on both interior and exterior floorings.
